description: The eight-year-old and his mother were pushed into the path of a train at Frankfurt station.
title: Frankfurt rail attack: Boy's killer given life in psychiatric ward
title_page: Frankfurt rail attack: Boy's killer given life in psychiatric ward - BBC News
maintext: In a statement to the court, he said he was "very seriously ill" and had no recollection of what had happened: "I'm extremely sorry, especially for the family of young eight-year-old Leo who died because of my act."
